channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Getting your steps in can reduce depression, research finds
item.description: A recent study shows getting walking more may help prevent depressive symptoms. Tracking your steps may help you stay motivated, researchers say.
item.content:encoded:
A recent study shows getting walking more may help prevent depressive symptoms. Tracking your steps may help you stay motivated, researchers say.

(Image credit: Jose Gonzalez Buenaposada/iStockphoto)
item.dc:creator: Ronnie Cohen

item.title: Heavy snow brings widespread disruption across the U.K.
item.description: Heavy snow and freezing rain has brought widespread disruption across the U.K., with several major airports forced to suspend flights and many key roads in the north of England unnavigable.
item.content:encoded:
Heavy snow and freezing rain has brought widespread disruption across the U.K., with several major airports forced to suspend flights and many key roads in the north of England unnavigable.

(Image credit: Scott Heppell)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Venezuela opposition leader Edmundo González embarks on international tour
item.description: González, who the United States recognized as the winner of last year's presidential election in Venezuela, kicked off an international tour on Saturday that will take him to Washington.
item.content:encoded:
González, who the United States recognized as the winner of last year's presidential election in Venezuela, kicked off an international tour on Saturday that will take him to Washington.

(Image credit: Natacha Pisarenko)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: South Korean protesters brave cold to demand Yoon's ouster as detention deadline looms
item.description: South Koreans rallied overnight near the residence of impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol calling for his arrest, as authorities prepared to renew their efforts to detain him.
item.content:encoded:
South Koreans rallied overnight near the residence of impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol calling for his arrest, as authorities prepared to renew their efforts to detain him.

(Image credit: Ahn Young-joon)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: The Golden Globes are Sunday night. Here's five things to look for
item.description: After a rocky few years and the disbanding of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association, the Golden Globes have seemingly stabilized. This time, comedian Nikki Glaser will be emceeing the ceremony.
item.content:encoded:
After a rocky few years and the disbanding of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association, the Golden Globes have seemingly stabilized. This time, comedian Nikki Glaser will be emceeing the ceremony.

(Image credit: Richard Shotwell)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Jurassic footprints are discovered on a 'dinosaur highway' in southern England
item.description: The 166-million-year-old footprint tracks, found at a quarry in southern England, mark one of the largest discoveries in decades.
item.content:encoded: The 166-million-year-old footprint tracks, found at a quarry in southern England, mark one of the largest discoveries in decades.
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Rosman

item.title: A storm will bring heavy snow and dangerous ice from the Plains to the East Coast
item.description: This weekend's storm is expected to impact 62 million Americans through Monday. Heavy snow, ice, rain and severe thunderstorms are being unleashed from the Plains to the East Coast.
item.content:encoded:
This weekend's storm is expected to impact 62 million Americans through Monday. Heavy snow, ice, rain and severe thunderstorms are being unleashed from the Plains to the East Coast.

(Image credit: NWS Weather Prediction Center)
item.dc:creator: Mansee Khurana

item.title: Film director and screenwriter Jeff Baena, husband of Aubrey Plaza, dead at 47
item.description: The co-writer of I Heart Huckabees and director of The Little Hours was found dead at a Los Angeles residence on Friday. The Los Angeles Police Department is investigating the case.
item.content:encoded:
The co-writer of I Heart Huckabees and director of The Little Hours was found dead at a Los Angeles residence on Friday. The Los Angeles Police Department is investigating the case.

(Image credit: Mark Davis)
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman

item.title: A Pulitzer winner quits 'Washington Post' after a cartoon on Bezos is killed
item.description: Washington Post cartoonist Ann Telnaes resigned after an editor rejected her sketch satirizing tech chiefs, including the Post's owner and Amazon founder Jeff Bezos.
item.content:encoded: Washington Post cartoonist Ann Telnaes resigned after an editor rejected her sketch satirizing tech chiefs, including the Post's owner and Amazon founder Jeff Bezos.
item.dc:creator: David Folkenflik

item.title: How influencers are impacting journalism
item.description: NPR's Eric Deggans speaks to Summer Harlow of the Knight Center for Journalism in the Americas and V Spehar of UnderTheDeskNews about the role of influencers in journalism.
item.content:encoded:
NPR's Eric Deggans speaks to Summer Harlow of the Knight Center for Journalism in the Americas and V Spehar of UnderTheDeskNews about the role of influencers in journalism.

(Image credit: Kevin Dietsch)
item.dc:creator: Eric Deggans
